definitions.definition: Of or relating to stereoscopy ; three-dimensional .
Of or relating to the stereoscope .
Designed to be used by both eyes simultaneously, or obtained by imaging from two viewpoints simultaneously.

main_definition: Of or relating to stereoscopy ; three-dimensional .
secondary_definitions: Of or relating to the stereoscope .
Designed to be used by both eyes simultaneously, or obtained by imaging from two viewpoints simultaneously.
